Description: Pottery ostracon with 6 lines of text containing a Coptic reading exercise (Rom 16.10-12).
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (24, pl.18)
Hasitzka 1990 / Neue Texte und Dokumentation zum Koptisch-Unterricht (141)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (82571) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/82571)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. I 18:2 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
Miscellaneous number: O.Rain.UnterrichtKopt. 210 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2008)
